title: Too Close to Touch (SCP-6988 Painting)
content:

[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include component:image-block
| name=6988.jpg

| caption= A double canvas painting of SCP-6988 using spray paint, acrylic, and pen.

-----

> Wanted to try something new in a slightly simplistic, yet different manner of painting by creating physical distance between two canvases that make one whole painting. It felt right to do it with 6988.
author: EmotionalEntropy
